otherNames: The Secret to Life and Death, 生死诀
synopsis: DetailsShaojiazhuang in Xi’an, Shaanxi Province, the owner of the village is named Shaohuashan. The talent is high and the future is promising. From the famous palace in Xi’an to the hardworking people, they are all respected and loved. The dignified number one talent, but he worked as a small editor in the Hanlin Academy, and survived bleakly. However, no one knew that he was the secret successor of the Huashan Secret Sect Eagle Snake.
